SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered adjuvant.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered conditioning therapy.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered consolidation therapy.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered induction therapy.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is used to treat locally advanced disease.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Locally Advanced Disease Clinical Trial Setting

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered maintenance therapy.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is used to treat metastatic disease.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered mobilization therapy.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered neo-adjuvant.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered preventative.
Any action that serves to increase the toxic or lethal effect of radiation therapy on cells, through physical, chemical, or pharmaceutical intervention.
A clinical trial or treatment setting in which the therapy of interest is considered salvage therapy.
